column5: Via a friend on Facebook, I have found these two gorgeous dogs in dire need of either a new home or a foster home till a new home can be found. They are both 8 yrs old (brother and sister) and have been together their whole lives so obviously the attachment is strong. I am waiting contact info and this is what I was sent about the dogs and their predicament.
Sunday is too short notice.  I can ask my sister though, she lives in Mt. Albert and used to foster dogs.   We are going away this week though and wont be back until Sept 4th.  Best of luck.

I can see what I can do, but 1 day notice makes it dang near impossible.  I'm in a rural area and know a lot of people with farms.  That could be a suitable foster (unless they have the husky trait to run).  I agree that they cant be split up, I've seen dogs die immediately after their "buddy" dies on more than one occasion.  That's a bond you can't mess with.  Regardless. keep me updated.  I probably won't be able to string anything together by tomorrow, but if you found an interim person, I might be able to help after.  Best of Luck, Ryan
I received the contact info.. Contact Britt at 519 505 6662 Hopefully we can find these two a place to stay!

I would be willing, on a foster type basis, and I would expect the owner to find a permanent home.... however Sunday is not doable... should a permanent owner not  be found I will return the dogs back to the owner after one month. I/we are located in Hamilton. the owness is on the dogs owner to find them suitable accommodation, i can help out for a bit... but will not assume permanent possession of the dogs.  G
YOU!!! are a good person.  Did you see the contact info Rick posted ?
Thanks to all and especially thanks to Gerrit for the offer. A home was found at the 11th hour for the two pups and they are happily staying together in their new home!!
Great to hear this Rick - I was thinking about those dogs this weekend!
Rick -good for you for your efforts... Gerrit - you is da man for stepping up to the plate  Having said this...im giving away my wifes cats...two of them ...anyone want them ...lol...just kidding
